content: Campaign Creation Wizard - Build comprehensive 4-step wizard with real API integration
Asset Search & Filtering - Create advanced search with real-time data and bulk operations
Client Management Forms - Enhance with 4-step stepper, logo upload, contact management
Campaign Matrix Functionality - Add quality scoring, strategic combinations, performance insights
Real Data Integration - Replace mock data with Supabase integration across remaining components
Approval Workflow System - Create comprehensive approval APIs and enhanced UI with statistics
Video Generation Integration - Integrate video generation with campaign/matrix systems
Analytics Dashboard - Enhanced analytics with performance tracking and insights
Real-time Features - WebSocket integration for live updates and collaboration
Social Publishing UI - Direct publishing interface with platform integrations
